name: media
title: Media
description: Table with media files (images/videos) captured by the camera traps. Associated with deployments (`deploymentID`) and organized in sequences (`sequenceID`). Includes timestamp and file path.

fields.name: mediaID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the media file.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment the observation belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deploymentID`.

fields.name: sequenceID
fields.description: Unique identifier (within a project) of the sequence the media file belongs to. Sequences contain one or more media files (e.g. a single image or video or a sequence of successive images or videos) and are defined by `sequenceInterval` in the Data Package metadata.

fields.name: captureMethod
fields.description: Method used to capture the media file.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time when the media file was recorded, as an ISO 8601 formatted string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssÂ±hh:mm`).

fields.name: filePath
fields.description: URL or relative path to the media file, respectively for externally hosted files or files that are part of the Data Package.

fields.name: fileName
fields.description: Name of a media file. If included, one should be able to sort media chronologically within a deployment on `timestamp` (first) and `fileName` (second).

fields.name: exifData
fields.description: EXIF data of the file, as a valid JSON object.

fields.name: favourite
fields.description: `true` if media file is deemed of interest, e.g. an exemplar photo of an individual.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the media file.

fields.name: _id
fields.description: Internal attribute of data management system: ID of this media file.
